bench::mark(
  colasce   = df_test %>%
    mutate(across(c(x, y), ~coalesce(., 0))),
  colasce2  = df_test %>%
    mutate(
      x = coalesce(x, 0),
      y = coalesce(y, 0),
    ),
  if_else_dplyr = df_test %>%
    mutate(
      x = if_else(is.na(x), 0, x),
      y = if_else(is.na(y), 0, y),
    ),
  ifelse_base = df_test %>%
    mutate(
      x = ifelse(is.na(x), 0, x),
      y = ifelse(is.na(y), 0, y),
    ),
  ifelse_dt = df_test %>%
    mutate(
      x = data.table::fifelse(is.na(x), 0, x),
      y = data.table::fifelse(is.na(y), 0, y),
    ),
  relace_na = df_test %>%
    replace_na(
      list(
        x = 0,
        y = 0
      )
    ),
  time_unit = 'ms'
) %>% 
  autoplot()
